headline: CarMax Earns Recognition as the Top Automotive Marketplace on Newsweek’s America’s Best Customer Service 2026 List
summary: RICHMOND, VA, Nov. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CarMax, Inc. (NYSE: KMX), the nation’s largest retailer of used cars, has been recognized by Newsweek as the number one automotive marketplace (online) on the America’s Best Customer Service 2026 list. This positive recognition affirms CarMax’s dedication to providing the most customer-centric car buying and selling experience in the industry. CarMax continues to set a new standard for the automotive industry with its customer-focused omni-channel
